name: persona1
speech_en: I recently started learning musical instruments

name: persona1
speech_en: I was thinking about what to learn and then decided to learn the guitar
speech_kr: 뭘 배울까 고민하다가 기타를 배우기로 결정했어

name: persona1
speech_en: I enrolled in academy because I wanted to work hard to see what other people are doing rather than playing alone
speech_kr: 혼자서 치는것보다 다른 사람들이 하는것도 보고 열심히 하고 싶어서 학원에 등록했어

name: persona1
speech_en: I was very excited because the atmosphere and people were so much better than I thought
speech_kr: 생각했던것보다 분위기나 사람들이 너무 좋아서 굉장히 흥분 했었어

name: persona1
speech_en: In the future, I will work really hard and do well
speech_kr: 앞으로 정말 열심히 노력해서 잘하게 될꺼야

name: persona1
speech_en: Aiming to play in front of other people
speech_kr: 다른 사람들 앞에서 연주를 하는 것을 목표로 하고 있어

name: persona1
speech_en: I think this is the most fun thing recently
speech_kr: 이게 최근에 가장 재미 있었던 일인것 같아
